name: Rubber Man (Magn)
description:
Mother Earth is under attack and only Rubber Man can protect her. Destroy the viruses and enter the tunnel of love (heart).

The mouse pointer controls the direction of the elastic rope. Press left mouse button to throw the elastic rope. Press any key to restart a level.

There are only three levels in this prototype. Good luck!

Submitted to Fireside Jam 2022.

Resources:

https://github.com/Apress/foundation-game-design-w-html5-javascript

https://killedbyapixel.github.io/ZzFX/
